name: Code Arena
description:
Test your programming skills in this text based adventure game. Complete tasks and level up!

When you find a task, enter 'open task' command to open the task in your browser. Your goal then is to find a way to write a program that can give correct outputs for given inputs. Then, use your program on 10 cases of which the solutions go in game with the command 'attack'.

Since this game is in demo mode, not all tasks are available. More to come soon! If you like the game, or not, please leave feedback so the game can improve! Also, if you like the game feel free to donate here or in game (in game there is no US tax cut from the donation)! I'm creating games in my spare time while on college, and would love to be able to focus more on it!
